info.name: stylish code editor | dark material design
info.description:
a dark, simple, material design re-theme for the Stylish CSS Editor

• some animations
• some other bs 
• literally only made this bc my eyes hurt when i stay up til 4am editing css

remember to like and subscribe thank u bye
